thread.section_title: PACK & SEND Australia Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of PACK & SEND Australia | www.packsend.com.au | 2 of 117
thread.title: Shannon Yendall
thread.title_full: PACK & SEND Australia reviewed by Shannon Yendall

author: Shannon Yendall
title: Shannon Yendall
text:
Second time I use them and both times disappointed!
First time pick up happened 4 business days after day scheduled. Second time delivery happened 3 businesses days later than scheduled...
Both times called, emailed... they didn't seem to know anything and only stalled. And no apology!
You DO NOT get your money's worth!
Will NOT use them again!
Updated on 08/03/17:
How can you not allocate my two assignments? It should be farely easy using my email and name...
Happy to discuss it but would rather do it here!
Update 2 on 08/03/17
As I said on my first review... stalling!
Update 3 on 08/03/17:
My only concern is that after all of this nothing was done and I'm still an unhappy customer...
